metadata.Author: Adam Conn
metadata.Readme:
=========================================================== Sample Personal Info Connector for xDB Ingestion Manager ===========================================================
----------------------------------------------------------- Prerequisites ----------------------------------------------------------- The following modules must be installed before this package is installed: * xDB Contact Utilities 1.1 (or greater) * xDB Ingestion Manager * Personal Info Connector for xDB Integration Manager
----------------------------------------------------------- About this package ----------------------------------------------------------- This package installs the Sitecore definition items that represent a sample configuration of the Personal Info Connector for xDB Integration Manager.
----------------------------------------------------------- Configuration instructions ----------------------------------------------------------- After the package is installed you must do the following:
1. Select /sitecore/system/Modules/xDB Ingestion Manager/Data Readers/File System Data Reader 2. For the "Data file path" field enter the location of the data file. 3. Publish site 4. Use the following URL to trigger the push handler: http://[YOUR SITECORE SERVER/-/push/personal

Entries.x-item: /master/sitecore/system/Modules/xDB Ingestion Manager/Pull Data Handlers/Personal Info Pull Data Handler/{F516797A-018D-4D79-AD74-562820DA65E0}/invariant/0
/master/sitecore/system/Modules/xDB Ingestion Manager/Push Data Handlers/Personal Info Push Data Handler/{BE273122-8E23-4F53-9614-582D8746A61B}/invariant/0
